Bead.name: Beads and Pellets
longtext: Soaps, scrubs, toothpaste, deodorant, sunscreen, lipstick,
eye shadow, shaving cream, drug delivery, production pellets
and powders, bead blasting (engine parts and boat hulls)

Fragment.name: Fragments
longtext: Degrated pieces of plastic litter, such as plastic bottles

Fiber.name: Fibers and Lines
longtext: Synthetic clothes and textiles, diapers, wipes,
tampons, cigarette butts, nets, atmospheric deposition
